name: lightterm
description: A browser based Linux Terminal emulator
author: Hamit Zor <thenrerise@gmail.com>

scripts.build: ([ -f ./config.json ] || (cp ./config-default.json ./config.json && echo '\n\e[1;33mconfig.json configuration file is not found, copying the default one...\n\e[0m')) && webpack --mode production && gulp -f ./gulpfile.js
scripts.build-watch: ([ -f ./config.json ] || (cp ./config-default.json ./config.json && echo '\n\e[1;33mconfig.json configuration file is not found, copying the default one...\n\e[0m')) && webpack --watch --mode development
